column5: 2 of my kids play hockey on the weekends. If it wasn't for that, I'd scoop this spot in a flash.  Now that I think of it, they both have games this afternoon and practices tonight, so Sunday................... Might be able to get a day trip in with our own boat. Hmmm !!!  Better work on the kitchen renovations today before the games or she's gonna blow a gasket if I take off. We're hosting Christmas dinner with her side.
Opening on Lloyd's boat for friday saturday and sunday and an opening for the motel rooms  if you want to go call Lloyds cell phone and let him know  905 375 0177
I hope everything is ok Terry......?
It's my spot Gerritt !
Whew,thought I would have to drag that deer myself on saturday Wayne.  Sry to hear yer not going.
Yeah, I know...  No gas mask this year
Hope things are okay, Wayne?!  Mighty tempting spot opening, though...
I gave it to Terry so he could attend perfect view...

Hey someone grab it... shared room at the picton Harbour and an easy walk to Lloyd's boat for 6am.  ..and so the person that JUMPS UP and grabs this knows the routine...  Up at 5 / 5:15.. off to Timmies for breakfast and the 24 hour grocery store for pre-made lunch.. to boat for a 6 am departure. We go out for supper. Saturday night will be JJ's steak house. We just found over the years making your own food is not economical or productive to fishing time!
Ohhhh this is painful.  Sorry you can't go Wayne....but even MORE sorry that I can't!     Hope somebody jumps on what is sure to be a golden opportunity.
Is it all paid for?....  IM IN....lol   nahhh...Saturday sound more interesting eh..
SPOT IS STILL OPEN !! Someone call in sick tomorrow and get your ass to the tip of the bay dock for  6AM. Call Lloyd's cell up  until 10pm tonight!
we are just going to M park to see Joey and Paul
SURE.. rub it in some more. Give Hun a big hug for me!
What ever happen to leave the electronics home and enjoy?
hey have to see ufc on internet saturday night
Will you guys be awake to watch it? Or should I say,smoke gets in my eyes
I can't believe someone hasn't taken this yet!!!  Man, a few more days notice, and I would have been all over it, but, I already had Tuesday off for steelheading!!!!!

It really is Frankie... room is BOOKED.. boat is FULLY EQUIPPED. . you need nothing but your fishing licence and wallet to pay  your share of the room, a bit of boat gas and your food.. as this isn't a charter. It was a bunch of friends going fishing for the last weekend before the boat gets towed home. I usually do that.. but Terry's little Dodge is gonna try it this round...
still open  I have the dodge darango V8 4x4 with me this weekend...
Yep.. like I said ! LOL

Yeah, I know, Wayne.  I stayed at that motel, Thanksgiving weekends when we went out with Lloyd.  Have been on his boat three times this year, so I pretty much know the routine "off by heart". Sorry, that you have to miss it, and hope all goes well with your daughter!! I'm a bit frustrated that I can't swing it, but, surely not nearly as much as you are!!!
if I wasn't going to p-vue with the others, HELL I'de be all over it!
Hey... 6am is a long way off.. call Lloyd.. and get on the boat tomorrow!! 23 fish IN the boat today!
And to think,Terrys on board.
I CAN'T BELIEVE I didn't see this
